alt: A picture of Mohammed Hamaki standing, looking to the camera and wearing a white, shoulder cut shirt. Holding a microphone with his right hand, twisting his body so that his left shoulder is closer to the camera. Spreading his palm and smiling with his teeth showing
singerCaption: Did you know Hamaki NEVER appeared in any cinematic action before? Hamaki is a dedicated, delicate & light hearted artist, he prioritizes his fans and their respect. Explore why is so beloved 💖
bio: The Egyptian superstar Mohammed Hamaki, is a celebrated pop and R&B singer. With his soulful voice and charismatic presence, he has captivated audiences worldwide. Renowned for hits like "Ma Balash," "Bahebak Kol Youm Aktar," and "We Eftakart," his music continues to enchant fans across the globe.

alt: A picture of Tamer Hosny standing, looking to the camera and wearing a black suit jacket above a black shirt and a black neck tie, both are rolled up to his elbow in both of his hands. Holding a microphone with his right hand, slightly twisting his body so that his left shoulder is closer to the camera. Spreading his palm and smiling with his teeth showing
singerCaption: Unveil the captivating journey of Tamer Hosny, the charismatic icon of music and film. With 20+ years of singing and 2 years in movie production, immerse yourself in the world of this versatile talent and his enchanting creations. 🎤🎬
bio: Tamer Hosny, an Egyptian singer-songwriter and actor, has earned immense fame with his remarkable talent and charming personality. Hits like "Habibi Wenta B'eed," "Si Al Sayed," and "180°" showcase his versatile music style, making him a beloved icon.

alt: A picture of Sherine, facing towards the camera and twisting her body a little backwards where her left shoulder is closer to the camera, wearing a white dress and smiling with her front teeth showing
singerCaption: Explore the profile of the Arab-world's most popular female voice, with more than 4.7 million YouTube subscribers & 1.5 billion YouTube views, you'll definitely find your pop-taste 🔥😍
bio: Sherine, the beloved Egyptian singer and actress, has won hearts with her enchanting voice. Her top songs like "Mashrebtesh Men Nilha," "Masha'er," and "Katar Khaere" reflect her incredible vocal prowess and emotional depth.

alt: A picture of Yara on the stage, looking to the audience and smiling, her white teeth are showing, holding the mic with her left hand and wearing a black soiree dress with a full makeup
singerCaption: Indulge in the angelic voice of Yara, the enchanting pop sensation of the Arab-world. With her captivating melodies and magnetic charm, explore why she holds a special place in the hearts of music enthusiasts everywhere. 🎶😇
bio: Yara is known as the beautiful and angelic face of the Arab Pop Culture. Widely acclaimed by the Arab audience, her breakthrough came in 2005 when launching her first single « Hob Kbir ». The three times Murex d’Or winner has excelled in performing in various dialects : Egyptian, Lebanese and Khaliji. The Key people in the music industry took immediate notice of her unique talent. In 2014, Yara signed an agreement with the production label « Watary », which has later on resulted in the anticipated release of the music video and Lebanese album « Ayech Bi Oyouni », later on the Khaliji album "Mou Mehtajekom" and lately the album "Meaazabni El Hawa".

alt: Nancy Ajram, wearing a silver glossy fancy dress, holding a mic with her right hand and laughs, her eyes are closed and her mouth is open of joy
singerCaption: Step into the spotlight with Nancy Ajram, the reigning queen of Arab pop. With over 1.5 billion YouTube views and a massive fan following, discover the allure of her sensational performances and chart-topping hits. 👑🌟
bio: Nancy Ajram, a Lebanese superstar, is a beacon of Middle Eastern pop music. With chart-toppers like "Ah W Noss," "Ma Tegi Hena," and "Mashy Haddy," she continues to reign as one of the region's most adored artists.
